captions.text: I just named off a bunch of people in your family who are gone!
Poor Peter, not even an avenger.
Probably gonna be friends with Flash later,
Probably gonna do really well after I graduate.
(cough) Says the full grown man who now wants to live in the sewers as a lizard.
Poor Peter Parker? Poor Doctor Connors!
Poor lives in the sewers wants to be a lizard, Doctor Connors.
You want to be a lizard!
Poor Peter Parker!  You're all alone!

title: How The Amazing Spider-Man Should Have Ended - Bonus Scene
